name: The Blue Snail Room
description:
Somehow you woke up in a room. Everything seems fine but the door is locked. Try to get out by finding clues and solving puzzles.

-

The Blue Snail Room is an amusing and relaxing room escape game for smart people.

Feedback : thewordyfish@gmail.com

Thank you!
